SideNav.tooltip: Learn the concepts essential to becoming a proficient Angular developer.

children.title: Components
children.tooltip: Building dynamic views with data binding

children.title: Overview
children.tooltip: Overview of how to create Angular components.

children.title: Component Lifecycle
children.tooltip: Angular calls lifecycle hook methods on directives and components as it creates, changes, and destroys them.

children.title: View Encapsulation
children.tooltip: Describes how component CSS styles are encapsulated into a component's view.

children.title: Component Interaction
children.tooltip: Share information between different directives and components.

children.title: Component Styles
children.tooltip: Add CSS styles that are specific to a component.

children.tooltip: Introductory guide to sharing data between parent and child directives or components.

children.title: Content Projection
children.tooltip: Learn how to create reusable components using Angular's content projection feature.

children.title: Dynamic Components
children.tooltip: Load components dynamically.

children.title: Angular Elements
children.tooltip: Convert components to Custom Elements.

children.title: Templates
children.tooltip: Syntax to use in templates for binding, expressions, and directives.

children.title: Introduction
children.tooltip: Introduction to writing templates that display data and consume user events with the help of data binding.

children.title: Text interpolation
children.tooltip: An introduction to interpolation and expressions in HTML.

children.title: Template statements
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to statements in templates that respond to events that components, directives, or elements raise.

children.title: Pipes
children.tooltip: Pipes transform displayed values within a template.

children.title: Property binding
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to setting element or input properties.

children.title: Attribute, class, and style bindings
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to setting the value of HTML attributes.

children.title: Event binding
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to listening for user interaction.

children.title: Two-way binding
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to sharing data between a class and a template.

children.title: Template reference variables
children.tooltip: Introductory guide to referring to DOM elements within a template.

children.title: SVG as templates
children.tooltip: Learn how to use SVGs as templates for Angular applications.

children.title: Directives
children.tooltip: Control the behavior of elements and the layout of your pages with directives.

children.tooltip: Introductory guide to some of the most popular built-in directives.

children.title: Attribute Directives
children.tooltip: Attribute directives attach behavior to elements.

children.title: Structural Directives
children.tooltip: Structural directives manipulate the layout of the page.

children.title: Angular Dependency Injection
children.tooltip: Angular's dependency injection system creates and delivers dependent services to Angular-created classes.
